basic.description: An introduction to basic issues in research with human participants, and the qualitative methods commonly employed in such research in geography. Where relevant, students may be introduced to computer software used in qualitative research.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: Introduction to Qualitative Methods in Geography

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite of GPHY101 or GPHY102 or permission of department.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from GPHY240/3.0; SOCY210/3.0.
